text.author: Wikinews
text.title: Wikinews interviews Mario J. Lucero and Isabel Ruiz of Heaven Sent Gaming
text.summary: In an interview with Wikinews, Mario J. Lucero and Isabel Ruiz, who run a website called Heaven Sent Gaming, talk about how they met in school, the people involved in their project and the motivation for their work.
